attributes.action: go ahead with plans to fund English classes for immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in opposition to a petition asking for the Government not to pay for such teaching and yet the creator of this petition would almost certainly be one of the first to castigate immigrants for being unable to speak it; not to mention the cost of translating official documents into "mother tongue" languages.  Immigrants, on the whole, are very badly-off so they are unable to afford to pay for such lessons themselves; if, therefore, the Government (or Local Authorities) will not pay for them how ARE they supposed to learn it?  The American government used to (and may still) pay for their immigrants to do so.
